name: Mecha Serpent
description:
Mecha Serpent is a game where the goal is to grow a snake large enough to reach its own tail, all the way around the globe. Follow the red lights on the snake's back and press the spacebar with perfect timing to add segments to the creature. Missclicking will instead remove a segment, so be careful.

Sounds confusing? No worries, the game comes with a handy and simple how-to-play tutorial.

Mecha Serpent will certainly test your reaction skills, but also how focused and determined you can stay. There is a cutscene at the end of the game, so do not even consider giving up :P Good luck!

This game was made for the JimJam #2, in 45 hours.
